title: The Texas Kid ( 1943) JOHNNY MACK BROWN

sources.title: The Texas Kid ( 1943) JOHNNY MACK BROWN
sources.description: Two fearless U.S. marshals struggle to stop frontier bully Scully (Edmund Cobb) and his hired guns from hijacking stagecoach deliveries and clearing out the local banks. Against the protests of his partner, Sandy Hopkins (Raymond Hatton), Jack "Nevada" McKenzie (Johnny Mack Brown) forges an uneasy a lliance with a mysterious member of Scully's camp, a youthful gunslinger known as the Texas Kid (Marshall Reed). As the trio investigates, the Kid begins to reveal an agenda entirely his own.
